quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因词根“over-”（过度）与“bearing”（举止）的字面组合，错误理解为“过度举止”，或混淆形近词“overwhelming”（压倒性的）而误判。
quiz_item.sentence: The new manager’s **overbearing** attitude made everyone feel uncomfortable—he refused to listen to others’ ideas and always demanded his own way.

option.definition: 过度举止的；行为夸张的
无法忍受的；难以承受的
